column4: Hey everyone, I jhave an issue with Ubuntu 12.04 64 Bit Version. I installed it just fine, but after I reboot, I get the following after passing my computer's bioi screen. It says, "Operating System not found." Any idea on how to fix this?
maybe you installed grub MBR to the wrong disk?  what drive did you pick to install MBR?
I guess you could boot your live usb/cd and mount your /dev/sda1 and verify that the system was installed
you have to install the package grub-efi
